channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Risk-On Behavior
item.description: Hey, Ross here! Everyone’s talking about Nvidia hitting new all-time highs—and sure, that’s impressive. But what really caught my eye is the ARK Innov...

item.title: A Clear Sign of Market Strength
item.description: Hey, Ross here! The Nasdaq 100 just hit a new all-time high—and it did it in just 86 trading days after a 20% drawdown. That’s the third-fastest recov...

item.title: This is What’s Supporting the Market
item.description: Hey, Ross here! I’ve talked about the NFCI before—it’s one of my favorite under-the-radar indicators for spotting what’s really happening in the marke...

item.title: Ready for a Market Surprise?
item.description: Hey, Ross here! Investor sentiment often says more about politics than price action. In today’s chart, you’ll see how bullish expectations shift based...
